content:
# The crafting of the stone furnace was successful, and I now have 1 stone furnace in my inventory along with 10 coal and 5 stone remaining. 
# The next step is to place the stone furnace on the map and ensure it is fueled with coal to begin smelting.

# I'll first move to a suitable position to place the stone furnace. 
# For this, I will find a valid buildable position near my current location.

furnace_position = nearest_buildable(Prototype.StoneFurnace)

# Now, I will place the stone furnace at the identified position.
place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=furnace_position)

# After placing the furnace, I need to insert coal into it to fuel the smelting process.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace_position, quantity=5)  # Inserting 5 coal

# Finally, I will check the inventory again to confirm the changes.
print(f"Inventory after placing furnace and fueling: {inspect_inventory()}")
